Ideas for KSP 2 (if someone ever does such thing)

- It starts with cars, and trains only... So you can build train tracks and roads.. Maybe you can race with different kind of race tracks. (multiplayer or best times world wide)

  Few villages over the Kerbin, maybe you have to transport resources to HQ.

- different kind of combustion engines for cars and maybe steam engines for trains (at start)

- Next comes airplane missions with propeller planes (and helicopters). After that jet motors.  (First solo flight round the Kerbin)

-Then satellite missions. (no pods with kerbals until solid satellite network)

-After those you can start you space program... Goal is build cities (or villages) to another planets or even far away solar systems (FTL engines)

 

What you think about this? 

 

(sorry if there's allready topic like this one)

 

best regards, Jetro

ps. KSP 1.3 is AWESOME!!!!!
If I wanted to play Railroad Tycoon, why would I buy Kerbal 2?

Kerbal Space Program is stronger than ever. It is not yet the time to start discussing KSP 2.

Edited August 2, 2017 by DerpzGames

20 hours ago, DerpzGames said:

Kerbal Space Program is stronger than ever. It is not yet the time to start discussing KSP 2.

It's hard to say this for certain.  I remember when KSP would be top of the sales charts whenever there was a sale.  Not so much anymore.  Consider that they've already begun producing DLC, and the latest hotfix is taking the same amount of time as a full update.  I think the signs are clear.  All games eventually end development, and I think people need to embrace this, instead of holding on to a false hope for infinite free updates.  Finishing a project is a good thing, and should be seen as such.

Personally, I'd wager Take Two is already planning KSP2.  I'd even say the potential profits from a sequel were the entire reason Take Two made the purchase in the first place.
